about_the_game:
Diets & Deities is an upcoming rhythm cooking game developed by Larrikin Interactive, an indie studio based in Darwin, Northern Territory. Discover the music and recipes from diverse cultures as you dodge to the beat and uncover the flavours of the universe.
This whole album is locally composed and produced music with authentic cultural instruments, sounds, and beats! The album has multiple musical identities for each of the areas in the game, of which are directly inspired by our team's backgrounds: Australian (with First Nations creatives), Balinese, Brazilian, and Chinese.

The album has multiple musical identities for each of the areas in the game, of which are directly inspired by our team's backgrounds: Australian (with First Nations creatives), Balinese, Brazilian, and Chinese.
name: Diets and Deities Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 700 MB available space

short_description: The rhythm game you can taste! This album is locally composed and produced music with authentic cultural instruments, sounds, and beats! Enjoy the diverse audio palette inspired by our team's backgrounds: Australian (with First Nations creatives), Balinese, Brazilian, and Chinese.
